Su experiencia en el trasporte es de más de 20 años, aunque continúa trabajando en el trasporte público y en el trasporte de carga a todo el país, desea incursionar en la fabricación de ladrillos, “es momento de tener algo propio, para poder proyectarme y no depender de los demás”, afirma. Su madre cuenta con un terreno apto para comenzar a equipar su fábrica, su idea es trabajar con peones que le ayudarán en las temporadas que se dedique al trasporte, pues no es constante, asimismo ya tiene un mercado fijo donde piensa vender sus ladrillos. Celso se encuentra optimista de lograr sus objetivos, pues es un hombre trabajador. 

Él pertenece al grupo solidario “Hualahoyo al progreso” y este es su primer crédito con MFP. Llegó al grupo por invitación de su hermana y está seguro de lograr sus objetivos con el apoyo de los integrantes de la grupo, quienes son personas responsables, por ello promete ser puntual con sus cuotas.
Celso invertirá el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de arcilla y los materiales necesarios para empezar la preparación de los ladrillos.
texts.en:
Celso, 38, lives in his mother’s house with his little brother and his son, Albert, who he cares for lovingly.  He has more than 20 years’ experience in transport and wants to go into brick manufacturing.  “This is the time to have something of my own to be able to move forward and not depend on others,” he affirms.  His mother has a piece of land that’s apt to start setting up his factory.  His idea is to work with day laborers who will help him while he’s working in transport because that’s not constant; he also already has a fixed market where he plans to sell his bricks.  Celso is optimistic about reaching his goals because he’s a hardworking man.

He belongs to the “Hualahoyo al Progreso” communal bank and this is his first MFP loan.  He arrived through an invitation from his sister and he’s sure to reach his objectives with support from fellow group members who are responsible people which is why he promises to be punctual with his installments.  Celso will use the money form this loan to buy clay and other necessary materials to make bricks.

loans.use: to buy clay and other brick-making supplies.

loans.name: Saidaly

texts.ru: Сайдали женатый мужчина и имеет 3 детей. Его дочь и старший сын совершеннолетние и живут отдельно от родителей. В настоящее время  Сайдали живет с женой и младшим сыном. Его супруга Чамиля учительница истории в школе. Сайдали более 10 лет работает в лицее для одаренных детей на должности завуча школы. Зарплата у Сайдали маленькая. Сайдали очень добрый отец и дедушка, в семье его и его супругу очень уважают, так как оба педагоги и очень грамотные люди. Сайдали в настоящее время живет с семьей в трех комнатной квартире. Два года назад он купил земельный участок и начал строит дом, так как он всю жизнь хотел жить в плановом доме. В течении два года он строит свой дом. Основную часть построил, остались молярные работы внутренней и внешней части дома, потолков, стен а также установка дверей и окон в комнатах, туалете и в сауне. На полученный кредит в размере 2000 USD, он хотел бы достроит дом до зимы, чтоб новый год отмечать всей семьей в новом доме.
texts.en: Saidaly is a married man and has three children.  His daughter and oldest son are adults and live separately from the parents.  Currently, Saidaly lives with his wife and their youngest son.  Saidaly's wife, Chamilya, is a history teacher at a school.  Saidaly has been working as an assistant director at a school for gifted children for over ten years.  His salary is small.  Saidaly is a kind father and grandfather.  He and his wife are very respected in their family because both of them are teachers and very well-educated people.  Saidaly currently lives with his family in a three-bedroom apartment.  He bought a plot of land two years ago and started to build a house because he has dreamed of living in a custom-built house all his life.  He has been building his house for two years.  He built the main part, but paint work for the interior and exterior of the house, ceilings, walls and installation of doors and windows in the rooms, bathroom and sauna remain.  Saidaly wants to use this loan in the amount of $2000 to finish building his house before the winter in order to celebrate the new year with his whole family in the new house.

loans.use: to finish building his house before the winter

loans.name: Noé De Jesús

texts.es: Noé de Jesús de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia importante que le permite mejorar su labor para cada siembra y así obtener las mejores cosechas de la zona, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en un lugar con mucha incidencia agrícola y cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores y tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque siempre tienen lo que necesitan a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Noé es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo, honesto, responsable pero sobre todo muy humilde siempre esta buscando nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aprovechar y aumentar sus ganancias por eso aumentara la producción pero para eso necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herbicida, herramienta, etc. Noé de Jesús tiene buenas referencias de pago y asegura poder cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo ofrecerle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Noé de Jesús is 33 years old and lives with his common-law wife and their children.  He is a farmer who grows mainly corn and beans.  He has several years of experience in agriculture which has taught him how to improve his results with every new season and obtain the best harvests in his area.

The land he cultivates is in an area with a lot of farming activity and is close to the community where he lives.  He sells this produce in all of the surrounding areas and has many customers who prefer to work with him since he always has what they need, and his prices are very affordable.  Further, his service is unequaled.

Noé is an honest and responsible man who is dedicated to his work.  But most of all he is very humble and is always looking for new opportunities to achieve his goals.

This planting season he wants to take the opportunity to increase his earnings.  To this end he will increase is production, but this requires working capital.  Thus he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy seed corn, beans, insecticide, herbicide and tools.

Noé de Jesús has good credit references and is sure he will be able to repay the loan and at the same time provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy seed corn, beans, insecticide, herbicide and tools.

loans.name: Israel De Los Ángeles

texts.es: Israel de Los Ángeles de 37 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y cuatro hijos, él trabaja en la agricultura sembrando maíz y maicillo, este ultimo utilizado para alimentar a diferentes animales de granja.  Israel es un padre de familia muy responsable quien también ha enseñado a sus hijos a luchar por vivir mejor, por lo que sus hijos mayores estudian y así mismo le ayudan a sembrar las semillas y a darles todo el mantenimiento necesario para obtener una buena cosecha. Israel solicita un préstamo  INTEGRAL, por medio del cual cuente con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de depósitos de aluminio para guardar y mantener fresco el maíz y el maicillo, así también comprar insecticidas para el mantenimiento   de las semillas y así de esta forma proveer un excelente producto.
texts.en:
Israel de Los Ángeles, 37, lives with his wife and four children.  He works in agriculture growing corn and sorghum.  The latter is used as animal feed for his farm animals.  Israel is a very responsible father who has taught his children how to strive in order to live better which is why his older children study and also help him plant the seeds and provide all necessary care in order to obtain a good harvest.

Israel is asking INTEGRAL for a loan by means of which to have the money needed to invest in aluminum silos to store and keep the corn and sorghum fresh.  He will also buy insecticides for seed maintenance thus producing an excellent product.

loans.use: to buy basic grains.

loans.name: Yen

texts.en:
Yen is 38 years old and married to Heng. They have nine children, one of whom recently married and no longer lives with the family. Being parents is quite a big responsibility for Yen and her spouse. They work hard to keep the family fed.

Yen and Heng are farmers. Heng is also in the construction business so as to earn more money to support his big family. But due to the high cost of living, Yen’s older children have decided to quit their secondary school studies and start working with their father in construction so they can help their younger brothers and sisters continue their education.

Now, Yen is applying for a 1,200,000 KHR loan from HKL to repair the family’s home, which is rundown and uncomfortable. She hopes that through this loan lenders will help her improve her family’s living situation.

loans.use: to repair the family’s home.

loans.name: María Gumercinda

texts.es: María Gumercinda es una madre de trabajo muy responsable y trabajadora, quien junto a su esposo se dedican de lleno a su trabajo para brindarles todo lo necesario a sus dos hijos, los cuales se dedican a estudiar. María se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijoles, maicillo y de legumbres como: repollo, tomate y otros más.  Todos estos productos los comercializa en diferentes mercados de la zona en la que ella habita contando en todo momento con la ayuda de su esposo, quienes desean darles todo lo mejor a sus hijos. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar, y así mismo para adquirir instrumentos como rastrillos, arados, y otros más y de esta forma agilizar su trabajo.
texts.en:
María Gumercinda’s a very hardworking, responsible mother who together with her husband works hard to provide everything necessary for their two children who are students.  María grows corn, beans, sorghum and vegetables like cabbage, tomatoes and others.  She sells all these products in various local markets in the area where she lives.  She can count on help from her husband at all times; they want to provide the best for their children.

She’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan in order to have the money needed to buy larger amounts of seeds to plant as well as to buy tools like rakes, plows and others in order to make work more efficient.

loans.use: to buy beans to plant.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María tiene 48 años, vive en compañía de Oscar, su esposo, desde hace 22 años; tienen seis hijos, pero ahora sólo viven con cuatro de ellos.
Gracias a su buen carácter ella ha logrado afrontar muchos problemas, cuenta con terrenos arrendados y eso hace que trabaje con más empeño, ya que tiene que pagar el alquiler anual. Sus principales siembras constan de papa, maíz, alverja y habas, los cuales cuida con mucha dedicación ya que depende de ello su ingreso económico. Pero consiente que las cosechas solo son una vez al año, también se dedica a la crianza de animales como gallinas y ovejas. Y aun tiene una vaca y un becerro, la que produce leche que comercializa a 2 nuevos soles por litro, de esa manera obtiene un ingreso adicional. 

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Hualahoyo al progreso” y este es su segundo crédito con MFP. Y en todo estos años de intenso trabajo y mucha dedicación obtuvo buenos resultados en su negocio, por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues en cada reunión con su grupo se incentiva la responsabilidad.
María invertirá este dinero en la compra de semilla de alfalfa, además de fertilizantes naturales para las dos hectáreas de terreno agrícola que piensa sembrar.
texts.en:
Maria is 48 years old and has lived with Oscar, her husband, for 22 years.  They have six children, but now they only live with four of them.  Thanks to her good character she has been able to face many problems.  She has rented land and this motivates her to work harder, since she has to pay the rent each year.  Her primary plants are potato, corn, peas and beans, which she cares for with a lot of dedication since she depends on them for her economic income.  But, allowing that the harvest is only once a year, she also works in raising animals like hens and sheep.  She even has a cow and a calf, which produce milk that she sells for two Nuevo soles per liter. In this manner, she obtains additional income.  

She is part of the lending group "Hualahoya al progreso" and this is her second loan with MFP.  In all of these years of intense work and a lot of dedication she has had good results with her business.  Therefore, she promises to be punctual with her repayments. In each meeting with her group she encourages responsibility.

Maria will invest this money in buying alfalfa seeds, as well as natural fertilizers for the two hectares of agricultural land that she will plant on.

loans.use: to buy alfalfa seeds and natural fertilizers

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es:
Marleny tiene 32 años, su esposo es Pedro, desde hace 13 años, tienen tres hijos: Gina, Mayumi y Jeri.
Su mayor anhelo es ver a sus hijos realizados, por ello, gracias al apoyo de su esposo, que trabaja en una mina, pudo abrir una pequeña tienda en su vivienda, donde no solo vende comestibles, sino también diversos accesorios de cocina y hasta acondicionó artículos de ferretería. “En mi tienda encuentran de todo”, afirma. Ya que su mayor deseo es tener un supermercado, donde todo este distribuido y acondicionado. Además de esto, se dedica a crianza de cuyes, ya tiene 70 ejemplares, los cuales engorda para luego venderlos.

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Hualahoyo al progreso” y este es su crédito número 19 con MFP. En todo estos años de intenso trabajo y mucha dedicación obtuvo buenos resultados en su negocio, por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues en cada reunión con su grupo se incentiva la responsabilidad.
Marleny invertirá el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de una puerta de metal enrollable para proteger su tienda.
texts.en:
Marleny is 32 years old and has been married to her husband Pedro for 13 years.  They have three children named Gina, Mayumi and Jeri.  Her greatest hope is to see her children fulfill their dreams.  To this end, thanks to the support of her husband, who works in a mine, she was able to open a small store in her home.  From this store she sells not only groceries, but also many types of cooking accessories.  She has even refurbished hardware items.

"In my store you can find everything", she reports.  Her main goal is to have a supermarket, where everything is prepared and sold.  Apart from this, she raises guinea pigs.  She already has 70 animals, which she is fattening for resale.

She belongs to the supportive group “Hualahoyo al progreso” , and this is her 19th loan with MFP.  In all these years of intense work and dedication she has obtained good results in her business endeavors. She promises to be punctual with the repayment of her loan. In every group meeting, personal responsibility is encouraged.

Marleny will use the loan funds to buy a metal roll-up door to protect her store.

loans.use: to buy a metal roll-up door to protect her store.

loans.name: Celina

texts.es:
Celina tiene 37 años, desde hace un año vive en una casa alquilada, junto a su esposo Fortunato y sus tres hijos, a los que cuida con mucho cariño.  
Su principal actividad es el trasporte, su esposo adquirió su propio auto con el que trabaja hace 6 meses trasportando a los pasajeros que desean ir a una localidad específica, que es donde ellos tienen su casa propia. Su trabajo es muy pesado, pues existen días en los que realiza varios viajes que duran horas, “tengo que ayudarle, sobre todo los días viernes que hay feria, los pobladores bajan a la ciudad”, afirma. Ella también trabaja cuidando a una anciana en la ciudad, donde por motivos de estudio de sus hijos, alquiló hace poco una casa. Ahora desea concretar los permisos de su auto para trabajar junto a su esposo, pues desea comprarse otro auto y así poder aumentar sus ingresos.  

Este es su crédito número 6 con MFP y en todo este tiempo pudo aprovechar las oportunidades de desarrollo que se le presentaron, pues contaba con el capital necesario gracias a estos préstamos, por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Esta vez Celina invertirá en el pago de los trámites de su auto, pues se venció la licencia de conducir y los demás permisos para el libre trasporte.
texts.en:
Celina is 37 years old. For the past year she has lived in a rented house with her husband, Fortunato, and their three children, whom they care for with great affection.

Her main business is transportation. Her husband acquired his own car with which he has been working for six months carrying passengers who want to go to a specific town, which is where they have the house they own. His work is very hard since some days he has to make several trips that last hours: “I have to help him, especially on Fridays, market days, when the inhabitants go down to the city.” she states. She also works taking care of an elderly women in the city, where she rented the house a short while ago because that is also where their children attend school. Now she wants to finalize the permits for their auto so she can work with her husband and she also wants to buy another car and thus increase their earnings.

This is her sixth loan from MFP and during this time she was able to make good use of the development opportunities offered her since she had the necessary capital, thanks to these loans. Consequently she promises to be punctual in making her payments. This time Celina will invest in paying for the formalities involved in driving their automobile, as the driver’s license has expired, and the rest of the permits for transporting passengers.

loans.use: to pay for the formalities of obtaining and renewing the permits and licenses to drive her automobile.

loans.name: Buth

texts.en:
Buth is 33 years old, married and has five children attending school. The family lives in a village in Reussey Keo district, a suburb of Phnom Penh. She describes herself as a humble but industrious woman.

Buth is a proud farmer who owns and manages one and a half hectares of farmland. She has also been working in a garment factory for over two years.

Buth now would like to take out a 350 USD loan from HKL to buy fertilizer and pay for labor on the farm. With the help of this loan she aims to work the farm well enough for it to yield a good harvest this year.

Buth plans to send all her children to school if she can afford it.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for labor on her farm.

loans.name: Kloeng

texts.en:
Kloeng is almost 46 years old, married, has two children and lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh.

He owns and operates a small grocery store serving breakfast and soft drinks including coffee, milk, lemon tea, and coke to people in his neighborhood. With this business, he earns enough for his daily expenses and is able to send one of his children to a good school. The other child is already married and lives independently.

Kloeng would like to renovate his grocery store to satisfy his customers and purchase more soft drinks to sell there. Kloeng is requesting a loan of USD 600 from HKL and Kiva. He believes that with the help of the loan, he will have more customers and thereby increase his store's income. In the future, Kloeng plans to continually expand this business. He wants to be a successful entrepreneur.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store and purchase more soft drinks for sale.

loans.name: Chhel

texts.en:
Chhel is a 46-year-old married woman who is responsible for five children, some of whom are employed as garment workers in Phnom Penh. Chhel is in the business of cultivating rice and making bamboo items including baskets and other containers for household use. Chhel’s husband also does the same business. Together, they can earn an average of USD 7.20 each day, from which they are able to cover their daily expenses, especially food.

Chhel wants to gain access to financial service through HKL to help her employed children. The children need help commuting to their workplaces. They currently use public transportation services, which cost a lot, for the everyday back and forth. Chhel would like to borrow a loan of USD 800 to purchase a motorcycle. This will help the children's commute, reduce some family expenses on public transportation and increase their household savings.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for her children commuting to work.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 29-year-old married man from Gaza.

He owns a printing and advertising company where he prepares designs and print advertisements. He asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy a printing machine and one cutting machine.

He hopes that his income will increase and thus provide his family with all their needs through the improving and developing of his work.

loans.use: to buy a printing machine and one cutting machine

loans.name: Nihad

texts.en:
Nihad is 34 years old and from Nablus.

Nihad is married and has 3 children.

He started as an employee at a bakery, and now he owns his own bakery and has 4 employees.

He asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy a dough mixer for his bakery and some ingredients.

He hopes that his product sales will increase, and thus his income will improve.

His ambition is to provide his children with the best education that he can afford.

loans.use: To buy a dough mixer and some ingredients for his bakery

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is 52 years old from Gaza. He is married and has three children.

Mahmoud has owns a store for selling fruits and vegetables for two years. He asked Ryada for this loan in order to buy goods, boxes, and a mini automobile for his store, which will help him increase his sales and improve his income.

His ambition is to provide his family and children with the best life and the best education.

loans.use: to buy goods, boxes, and a mini automobile for his store

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 22 years old and from Gaza. Mohammad has owned a grocery store since 2009.

He asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy more goods and build an attic in his grocery store in order to enlarge the space for storage.

He hopes that he will increase his income and that in the future he will have a big supermarket.

loans.use: to buy more goods and build an attic in his grocery store

loans.name: Petronila

texts.en:
Petronila is a single mother of two school-going children. She is 47 years old. She operates a grocery store and has been in the business for the past 12 years.

This is her first loan from KADET LTD. She was introduced to us by one of our field officers. She will use the loan amount to purchase stock of assorted vegetables for sale in her business. She will use part of it also to pay school fees for her children.

She hopes to raise enough school fees for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of assorted vegetables for resale.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 52 years old. He is from Ndunyu-Njeru and is married with six children who are between 19 and 30 years old.

David is a farmer and has been in it for the past 34 years. He has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides. David is optimistic that his business will do well after the loan.

He hopes to get a good harvest from his farm and be able to make of profit in the near future.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Khut

texts.en:
Khut is from Prey Chor district where she lives with her husband and three children. She farms rice while her husband drives a horse-pulled cart within the commune. He mainly hauls rice and other seasonal crops from the fields into the village, earning approximately 8,000 KHR a day.

Khut has applied for a 1,500,000 KHR loan from HKL to help her husband buy another horse for his business. With any remaining amount she will buy a few sacks of fertilizer for her rice crops.

Khut’s ambition is to gradually raise her family’s living standards and attain financial stability someday. Her husband and she also want to educate their children to as high a level as they can. She is appreciative of the generous lenders who make it possible for her to reach these goals.

loans.use: buy another horse for her husband's hauling business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is from Talibon, Bohol. She is married with three children ages 8, 10 and 12. She operates a small restaurant in town, locally known as “carenderia”. Her business has been in existence for three years. Her husband helps as a cook and works hard for their family.

Elizabeth is asking for a loan to buy ingredients like meat, vegetables and groceries that she can cook daily. This would help so she can continue her business, since some of her customers buy food on credit. She would like to add more menu items in the future, to attract more customers and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, vegetables and groceries for her restaurant.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma lives in Talibon, Bohol, Philippines. She is 44 years old with a 19 year old daughter. She has been in the business of buying and selling cassava, banana and spices for ten years. Emma gives her best to earn a living in order to support the needs of her family. Her business provides her the income that she needs.

Emma wants to expand her business to generate more income but she needs funds to make it possible. She is requesting for a loan to buy more cassava, banana and spices. With the loan, she will be able to make her business sustainable and more profitable. Emma wants to earn more so that she can meet the basic needs of her household, like food, electricity and the water bills.

loans.use: to buy more cassava, banana and spices

loans.name: Jose Ellery

texts.en:
Jose Ellery is engaged in catching crabs in the town of Talibo, Bohol. He is married with four grown children. Jose is 53 years old, married, with a son who is 15 years old. It is his dream that he can continue his business and even improve it for a bigger income.

He is asking for a loan to buy crab traps that are necessary for catching crabs. His income will provide a nutritious diet for his family, school fees and this will also pay the family’s electric bill. Any additional income will be reinvested for the same business and set aside as savings.

loans.use: to buy crab traps

loans.name: Masouda

texts.en:
Masouda is 26 years old and from Gaza.

Masouda is married and has three children: two boys and a girl.

She makes and sells juice at her house.

She asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy ingredients like sugar, carouba, and tincture.

She hopes that her business will grow so that she can open a shop for making juice away from their house.

loans.use: To buy ingredients like sugar, carouba, and tincture

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is 58 years old. She lives with her husband and three children in the village of Guayabal. She is a woman who remains lively and innovative. She has worked throughout her life to give her family a good quality of life. The fact is, she opened a store based in their home and offered a variety of basic needs for a long years. She works hard for her business. To make it possible, she is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy a variety of items such as noodles, eggs, canned goods, beans, sugar, salt, detergent and other items that are attractive to her customers. This way, she hopes to enhance the quality of life for her family, which is the most important thing to her.

loans.use: to buy a variety of items such as noodles, eggs, canned goods, beans, sugar, salt, detergent, and other items that are attractive to her customers

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en: Catalina is a 40-year-old married woman who is blessed with two children. She has been operating a retail shop for five years and her primary customers are neighbors. She is blessed with many customers because of her humbleness and friendly attitude. With this blessing, she wants to expand her business by asking for financial assistance from ASKI. She is requesting a loan of 30,000 pesos to buy canned goods, noodles, sugar, cooking oil and biscuits to sell. She hopes for the improvement of her business. She knows that, with God’s help, she will be able to establish a wholesale business in the future.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, sugar, cooking oil and biscuits to sell

loans.name: Emomaly

texts.ru: Эмомали трудолюбивый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Дети еще учатся в школе. Эмомали был сиротой и вырос в детском доме для сирот. После средней школы закончил техникум. Условия жизни у него были очень тяжелые. После занятий в техникуме работал на разных местах, чтобы зарабатывать деньги для себя. Эмомали женился на собственно заработанные деньги, и с женой 16 лет жили в съемной квартире. С 2001 года Эмомали начал занимается бизнесом на рынке. Эмомали в настоящее время торгует женской и детской одеждой. Торговля идет нормально, имеет постоянных клиентов. От дохода он купил квартиру, но его квартира нуждается в ремонте. Он хотел бы на полученный кредит в размере 1000 USD перестроит старый туалет, кладовку, душевую. Он ждет вашу помощь.
texts.en: Emomaly is a hardworking person, who is married and raising two children.  His children still attend a school.  Emomaly was an orphan and grew up in an orphanage.  He graduated from college after finishing a secondary school.  His life conditions were very hard.  He worked at various places after college, trying to earn money for himself.  Emomaly got married with his earnings, and he and his wife spent 16 years living in a leased apartment.  Emomaly got involved in a business at a market in 2001.  He currently sells women's and children's clothing.  The sales are going well, and he has regular customers.  He purchased an apartment with his earnings, but his apartment is in need of repairs.  Emomaly wants to use this loan in the amount of $1000 to rebuild an old bathroom, closet and shower.  He awaits your help.

loans.use: to rebuild an old bathroom, closet and shower

loans.name: Dimas Alfonso

texts.es: Dimas Alfonso vive junto a su familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y dos hijos menores de edad y quienes son la razón principal para esforzarse y salir adelante. Dimas es un joven responsable y trabajador quien es conocido en su lugar de habitación por ser muy respetuoso y dedicado a su familia. Para sacar adelante a su familia Dimas se dedica a la agricultura de maíz y maicillo, actividad que en la actualidad no ha iniciado debido a la falta de dinero para comprar las semillas para sembrar, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL con el enorme deseo de iniciar el cultivo, así también solicita dicho préstamo para la compra de pesticidas, sacos para colocar los granos básicos y posteriormente comercializarlos. Con esto Dimas espera mejorar su negocio, del cual depende él y toda su familia.
texts.en:
Dimas Alfonso lives with his family, which is composed of his wife and two minor children, who are his principal reason for working hard and getting ahead. Dimas is a responsible and hardworking young man known in the area where he lives for his very respectful demeanor and dedication to his family.

In order to move his family forward, Dimas works farming maize and sorghum, a task that he has not yet started because he does not have the money to buy the seeds to plant. Consequently he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL with an enormous desire to start planting. The loan will be used to buy pesticides, bags to put the basic grains in and later to market them in. With this loan, Dimas hopes to improve his business, which the whole family depends on.

loans.use: to buy basic grains.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan de 57 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura, uno de los oficios más antiguos que existen en este país, y que ha permitido que muchas personas hayan  salido adelante. El vive junto a su familia en una pequeña parcela gracias a la cual puede sembrar frijoles, maíz y maicillo, granos básicos los cuales comercializa en diferentes mercados del municipio en el que reside, y así mismo su esposa le ayuda a venderlo en su casa con vecinos y amigos. Juan solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de maíz, frijoles y maicillo para sembrar, de esta forma él espera incrementar su cosecha y así aumentar al máximo sus ventas. Debido a que es una persona muy responsable cuenta con gran cantidad de clientes, a quienes desea brindarles el mejor servicio.
texts.en: Juan is 57 years old and works as a farmer, one of the oldest employments that exists in this country and one that has allowed many people to get ahead. He lives together with his family on a small parcel. Thanks to it, he can plant beans, corn and sorghum, basic grains that he sells in different markets in the town where he lives. Similarly, his wife helps him sell it in their home to friends and family. Juan seeks a loan from Integral, through which he can count on having enough money necessary to invest in the purchase of corn, beans and sorghum to plant. He hopes to increase his harvest and likewise maximize his sales this way. Owing to the fact that he is a very responsible person, he has a great number of customers to whom he wishes to provide the best service.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Ndele

texts.en:
Ndele is 27 years old, married, and blessed with two children. He sells medicine for domestics. He has been in business for the last 3 years and gets an income of 8,000 Kenya shillings (KES) per month.

Ndele has good credit history in KADET LTD and he is applying for his second loan of 60,000 KES from KADET LTD, with which he plans to buy more medicines for de-worming his livestock and to purchase more veterinary materials. He will use the anticipated profit to pay fees for his children.

He hopes to have a happy family.

loans.use: to buy de-worming medicines for his livestock.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 29 years old and is married with one child who is 10 years old.

Susan has a cereals business that she has had for the past 4 years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her buy dry maize, beans, peas, and maize flour for sale.

She hopes to have a bigger cereals shop and be able to employ many people in the future.

loans.use: to buy maize, beans, peas, and maize flour.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is 36 years old and married with two daughters who are between 10 and 14 years.

Fredrick has a butchery shop that he has been running for the past 12 years and has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him buy a bull to slaughter for more stock of meat for sale in his butchery.

He hopes to see his butchery shop expand in the near future.

loans.use: to buy a bull to slaughter for more stock of meat in his butchery.

loans.name: Maok

texts.en: Maok is from Reussey Keo district, a suburb of Phnom Penh. She is 52 years old, widowed, and has two daughters who currently work for a garment factory. Maok stands both as a mother and father in bringing up her children. She is very diligent in with her farming business, growing rice and vegetables for food as well as for sale, from which she is able to make approximately KHR 8,000 each day. She has been in this business for over 20 years. Recently, one of her daughters got a goiter at the front of her neck and the doctor said it must be operated on in a timely manner. However, Moak doesn’t have enough money to pay for the operation and medical fees. Maok decided to seek financial assistance through HKL, a partner of Kiva, in the amount of USD 1,000. She hopes that lenders will understand her situation and give this loan to help her family. She is very, very grateful and promises to pay her loan back on time as scheduled.

loans.use: to pay for an operation and medical fees.

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion is from the small village of Guayabal. She is 43 years old.  She is married and has four children. Visitacion is recognized as a responsible mother who has been engaged in the hog-raising business for five years. She is willing to work hard to lift her family from poor living. 

At this moment, Visitacion is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 15,000 to purchase feed, vaccine and an additional hog to raise. This will help increase her earnings. She would like to improve her sales to save for the education of her children. She wants them to achieve their chosen career someday.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vaccine and an additional hog to raise

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en: Zenaida is 58 years old. She is married to a farmer. The couple is thankful because they have been blessed with nine children. She lives with her family in a small village of Guayabal and generates her income through growing vegetables. She wants to earn more income to provide for her family's needs and save for the future of her children. At this time, she has tried to plant more vegetables to increase her production. Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for a loan of P30,000 (Philippine pesos) to buy seeds and fertilizers to sustain her vegetable production. She believes that the loan will help her increase her yields. She is hoping to harvest a large volume of vegetables and earn a higher income to support her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers to sustain her vegetable production

loans.name: Meth

texts.en:
Meth is a 35-year-old married woman who has been residing in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. Meth is from a low-income family and she only finished her education at primary school level. She quit studying because she wanted to help her parents in solving financial difficulties of the family. 

She started her business as a rice cultivator and has been working in it ever since. She is now married with two school-age children who still depend on her and her spouse.

As of now, Meth would like to take out a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase gasoline and spare parts for the maintenance of her plowing machine. With this help, Meth can use her plowing machine again and it will help as it did in the previous time. She hopes that she will be able to have a plenty of harvest and yield a better income.

loans.use: to purchase gasoline and spare parts for the maintenance of her plowing machine.

loans.name: Tep

texts.en:
Tep, a father of five grown children, three of whom are married, is a 60-year-old widower living in Ornlong Veng district, Oddar Meanchey province. His main business is rice farming, and he has a secondary enterprise making kindling. From the two businesses, he earns a good income, and recently some of his children have begun helping him in his activities to better their household income.

Due to the lack of raw materials for his kindling, Tep is requesting a loan through HKL, a Kiva partner, to purchase a type of resin used in producing kindling. He believes that he will be able to increase his production with the help of the loan and thereby generate greater income.

loans.use: to purchase a type of resin used in producing kindling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Gumercindo

texts.es: Gumercindo de 57 años de edad, es una persona muy conocida en su lugar de residencia por ser muy responsable y trabajador, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, lo que realiza en unas pequeñas parcelas, así mismo posee un pequeño ganado, siendo la agricultura la actividad principal. Gumercindo  junto a su esposa e hijos realiza la actividad de arar la tierra, sembrar y cuidar de los cultivos, que posteriormente comercializan. Con el anhelo de hacer crecer su negocio y aumentar la cantidad de clientes y así mismo sus ventas, Julio solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, esto con el enorme deseo de comprar mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar, así mismo para adquirir algunos compartimientos para conservar los granos frescos, y también para comprar pesticidas. Gumercindo desea realizar lo mejor posible su trabajo, ya que de esta forma podrá contar con clientes satisfechos que regresarán nuevamente a comprar sus productos lo que es muy positivo para el crecimiento de su negocio y la economía de su hogar.
texts.en:
Gumercindo is 57 years old.  He is well-known in his area for being a very hardworking and responsible person.  He grows corn and beans on a few small parcels of land.  He also has a small herd of livestock, as farming is is main economic activity.

He and his wife and children work together to plow the land and to plants and take care of the crops, which they then sell.  With the hope of being able to grow his business and expand his customer base, he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL.  He greatly desires to buy a greater quantity of seeds to sow, and also to purchase some containers to keep the seeds fresh.  Additionally, he wants to buy pesticide.

Gumercindo wants to do the best possible job that he can.  This will ensure that he has satisfied customers that will return to purchase his products again.  This will have a very positive effect on the growth of his business as well as his household finances.

loans.use: to buy corn and beans for planting.

loans.name: Chheng

texts.en:
Chheng is 27 years of age.  She is married and has two lovely kids living in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is a conscientious rice farmer who owns and manages around two hectares of farmland. She usually works in this type of business along with her spouse twice a year, together, earning in the vicinity of USD 4.00 each day. Chheng has been doing this for almost 13 years old. Rice farming is the sole of her family’s income. Chheng aspires to achieve financial stability and provide her children with comfortable living conditions. 

Chheng would like to acquire a loan in the sums of USD 350 to purchase electrical wire, and other electrical equipment used for the connection of electricity from the main generator of private suppliers. With this supply, it will enable her family to live in better situation and have electricity for household use.

loans.use: to purchase electrical wire, and other electrical equipment used for the connection of electricity from the main generator of private suppliers.

loans.name: Leak

texts.en:
Leak, a 56-year-old married mother of eight children, six of whom are married, lives with her family in Kampot province, Cambodia, earning a living by rice farming. Leak has been working alongside her husband for almost 33 years, earning around KHR 10,000 each day. Despite her hardships, she would like to improve her business and increase her annual output by expanding the size of her farmland.

Leak is now requesting a 1,000,000 KHR loan to purchase a cow for the maintenance of the rice field. This will enable her to improve productivity and reduce plowing costs as she hopes to earn a better income in the coming harvesting season. In the future, she plans to purchase a machine used to make Khmer noodles to sell.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for the maintenance of the rice field.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en: Lorna is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with nine children. Lorna has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has had this business for nine years. She requested a loan for  PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages. Lorna has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Lorna hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more items of ready-to-wear clothing to resell

loans.name: Abimael

texts.es: Abimael de 46 años de edad, habita junto a su familia que está conformada por su esposa y sus 3 hijos, viven en casa propia. Él es un hombre muy trabajador que  se ha dedicado a trabajar mucho por su familia.  Un hombre honrado, honesto que siempre se ha realizado de la mejor manera su trabajo. Siempre se ha dedicado al cultivo de granos básicos como lo son el maíz, café, entre otros. Pero debido a las lluvias que han pasado en nuestro país se atrasó un poco con sus cultivos y no pudo concretar la cosecha ya que el café se encontraba en mal estado. Es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL  para solicitar un crédito ya si poder comprar insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas,  etc. Ya que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para poderlos comprar por cuenta propia. Abimael agradece de ante mano la ayuda que recibirá y está seguro que de las próximas cosechas podrá pagar la deuda antes del tiempo acordado y así le seguirá brindando una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: Abimael is 46 years old and lives in his own home together with his family which is composed of his wife and their three children. He is a very hard working man who is committed to working a lot for his family. He is an honorable and honest man who has always completed his work in the best way. He has always worked cultivating basic grains like corn and coffee, among others. But, owing to the rains that have happened in our country, his crops have slowed down and he could not complete the harvest because he found that the coffee was in bad condition. It was because of this that he reached out to Integral to seek a loan to see if he could buy agricultural supplies like: seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc. Today, he cannot count on the necessary resources to be able to purchase these items on his own. Abimael is thankful in advance for the help that he will receive and he is sure that with the next harvests he will be able to pay the loan on time and this way he will continue providing a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like: seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Karen Beatriz

texts.es: Karen de 23 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar, en casa propia. Es una mujer luchadora que siempre se ha interesado en darle una mejor vida a ella y a su familia, es muy honesta y responsable muy conocida por sus vecino por ser alegre y siempre dedicada a su trabajo. Karen se dedica desde hace un tiempo a la agricultura de granos básicos como lo son frijoles, arroz, entre otros, ubicado en un terreno de la familia y otra parte es alquilada.  Pero además cuando no hay tiempo de muchas cosechas se dedica a la labor de la ganadería que es la crianza de ganado y es así como ella siempre lleva el sustento a su hogar. Karen  cree que necesita ampliar su cosecha y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como lo son: Semillas, Pesticidas, Insecticidas entre otros. Para mejorar la cosecha y así obtener mayores ganancias agradece de ante mano la ayuda brindada y esta segura que con esta ayuda ella mejorara las condiciones de vida de ella y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Karen, 23, lives with her family in their home. She is a determined woman who has always wanted to provide a better life for herself and her family. She is honest, responsible, and well-known among her neighbors as being happy and dedicated to her work. For some time, Karen has been cultivating basic grains such as beans and rice on a family plot and another rented plot. In addition, when she isn't busy with harvest, she raises livestock, which ensures that she always has income to support her household.

Karen believes she must increase her harvest and, therefore, is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, pesticides, insecticides, and others. She would like to thank the lenders in advance for their help, which will allow her to increase her harvest and profits and thereby ensure that she can improve her situation and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, pesticides, insecticides, and others.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar Armando vive junto a su esposo e hijos, por quienes  trabaja muy duro día con día, con el deseo de salir adelante Oscar labora como ayudante de albañil, realizando trabajos como reparaciones de baños, construcción de muros, entre otros más, así mismo a la siembra de frijoles y maíz, el cual vende junto a su esposa, quien también se dedica al cuido de sus niños y a los quehaceres del hogar. Oscar solicita un préstamo a INTREGRAL, por medio del pueda realizar la compra  granos básicos que durante tantos años han sido los que le han permitido llevar el sustento diario a su hogar, con el préstamo Oscar comprará también todos los insumos necesarios como pesticidas, abono y más.
texts.en:
Oscar Armando lives with his wife and children.  It is for them that he works very hard day to day with the wish to get ahead.  Oscar works as an assistant bricklayer.  He does jobs like repairing bathrooms and building walls, among others.

He also grows beans and corn, which he and his wife sell together.  She also devotes herself to caring for their children and the household chores.

Oscar is requesting a loan from Integral so that he can buy basic grains.  For so many years basic grains have allowed him to provide daily sustenance for his household.  Oscar will use this loan to also buy all of the necessary supplies like pesticide, fertilizer, and more.

loans.use: to buy basic grains to sell.

loans.name: Hy

texts.en:
Hy, aged 60, is married to Hout and they have four children, one of whom is living far away with her new family. Hy is a hard-working farmer cultivating rice and vegetables among the two seasons of the year, and typically generates approximately 5.00 USD per day to cover his daily needs. He has been working in this field for almost 30 years.

To share responsibilities and help their parents earn household income, two of his children are employed in various careers: a chief construction worker and a garment worker. Hy would like to help his son in the construction industry and so is requesting a loan from HKL and Kiva in the amount of 1,000 USD to purchase construction supplies and tools. This loan will have a positive impact on his business and living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies and tools.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes tiene 30 años, vive en compañía de su esposo Luis, con quien tiene dos hijos, en la casa que heredó de sus padres hace 10 años.
Se dedica a la agricultura, todavía no cuenta con terrenos propios, solo alquila hectáreas para sembrar maíz, papa y oca. Hace poco incursionó en la ganadería con la crianza de ovejas y cerdos, a los que engorda y cuando se encuentran maduros los comercializa en la ciudad, durante la feria de los domingos o a los carniceros que llegan a su zona. “Existen días en los que obtengo el doble del dinero invertido en cada animal”, comenta. Por esa razón, planea aumentar su capital para poder comprar más animales.

Este es su crédito número 7 con MFP y en este tiempo ha logrado invertir en sus cultivos y mejorar su producción. Por ello, promete seguir siendo puntual, como lo estuvo realizando hasta ahora, con el pago de sus cuotas.
Mercedes invertirá el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de 10 ovejas.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 30 years old. She lives in the company of her husband Luis, with whom she has two children, in the house that she inherited from her parents 10 years ago. She works as a farmer and she does not yet have her own lands. She only rents hectares to plant corn and potatoes and to raise geese. A little while ago, she experimented with raising livestock by raising sheep and pigs, which she fattens and when they are mature she sells them in the city during the Sunday markets or to the butchers that live in her area. "There are days during which I obtain double the money I invested in each animal" she told us. For this reason, she plans to increase her capital to be able to buy more animals.

This is her 7th loan with MFP and this time she has been able to invest in her crops and improve her production. Because of this, she promises to continue being on time, which she has been up to now, with the payment of her portions. Mercedes will invest the money from this loan in the purchase of 10 sheep.

loans.use: to buy 10 sheep.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Oscar de 47 años de edad es una persona  muy trabajadora, quien vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos los cuales se dedican a estudiar. Oscar ha vivido toda su vida en el mismo lugar por lo que es muy conocido por ser alguien responsable y comprometido por el bienestar de su familia. El se dedica a la venta de granos básicos, los cuales también se encarga de cultivar en el terreno en que alquila. Oscar siembra maíz y frijol dos de los granos básicos con más demanda ya que son parte de la dieta diaria de nuestro país. Con el enorme deseo de aumentar sus ventas, Oscar solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y de esta forma contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de semillas, pesticidas, abono, compartimientos y todo lo necesario para realizar su siembra y mantener la frescura de sus productos y así de esta manera mejorar sus ventas, lo cual será de gran beneficio para su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar, 47, is a hardworking person. He lives with his wife and children, who are students. Oscar has lived in the same town all his life and is known for being responsible and committed to his family's welfare. He sells basic grains that he grows on leased land. He plants corn and beans, the most important grains in the daily diet of his countrymen.

With a strong desire to increase sales, Oscar is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he will have sufficient capital to buy seeds, pesticides, fertilizer, storage containers, and other items needed to plant his products and keep them fresh. This will let him increase sales, which will be very beneficial for his family.

loans.use: to buy planting supplies.

loans.name: Ubumwe /  Mshsh Group

texts.fr:
André fait partie du groupe Ubumwe / Mshsh. Le nom du groupe signifie «United». Il a 41 ans, il est marie avec 4 enfants de 2 ans à 14 ans, dont 3 scolarises. Il a 2 personnes en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

André est agriculteur des tomates. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter  des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre.

Pour faire croitre son agriculture des tomates, il planifie de demande d’autres prêt pour finance ses activités et travailler beaucoup pour obtenir de grande quantité des tomates. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait devenir un grand cultivateur des tomates. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer le frais scolaire pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
André is part of the Ubumwe/Mshsh group.  The name means "united".  He is 41 years old and married with four children between 2 and 14, three of whom are in school.  He also cares for two other people in addition to his children.  He has six years of primary eduction.

André is a tomato farmer.  This is his first loan cycle with ACB, and he will use his loan to buy fertilizers and pay for labor costs.  To enlarge his tomato farming business, André plans to request other loans to finance his business and to work hard to obtain a large quantity of tomatoes.  In the next few years he would like to become a large-scale tomato farmer.  With the profits, he plans to pay his children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay labor costs.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en: Margie, 45, is married and has four children. She has a retail business selling a variety of products in her community. Margie is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell. She dreams of someday having her own stall so that she can meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, spices and canned goods for her store

loans.name: Junie

texts.en:
Junie is 25 years old and is engaged in catching crabs and fishing in the town of Talibon, Bohol. He is married with four children ages 1, 2, 4 and 6. This business is something that he knows best, and he would like to ask for a loan to sustain his business and make improvements. His loan request will be used to purchase crab traps, fishing hooks and gasoline for his boat. 
His income will provide a nutritious diet for his family and pay school fees and the family’s electric bill. 
Any additional income will be reinvested for the same business and savings.

loans.use: to purchase crab traps, fishing hooks and gasoline

loans.name: Adoracion

texts.en: Adoracion is 42 years old, and is married to Clemente. The couple is thankful because they had been blessed with three children. Adoracion has been running her sari-sari store business for almost three years and earns about PHP 300 a day. Adoracion is a kind and energetic mother. She will do everything to lift up her family from poor living. Adoracion wants to re-stock her sari-sari store. To make it possible, Adoracion needs financial assistance. Therefore, Adoracion is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 25,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, candies, curls, and soft-drinks to sell in her general store.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, candies, curls, and soft-drinks to sell

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with two children.

To earn a living, Edgar has a tailoring shop, where he makes and sells sports attire and school and office uniforms. He has operated this business for eight years.

He requested a loan in the amount of 5,000 PHP to buy additional textiles for his tailoring work. Edgar is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Edgar hopes to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional textiles to make sports attire and school and office uniforms.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 55 years old, married to Julio, and lives in Isabela. They are blessed with three children: Julie, Julio, and Janica.

Rosario explains that her grocery store is situated in an urban area, where there are many customers, especially during school days because many high school and college students come to her store.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more and varied food items (e.g., snack foods, canned foods, and spices) to sell in the canteen. She expects that the loan proceeds will allow her to bring in more customers and to thereby generate more sales. She dreams of becoming a successful businesswoman so that she will be able to give her children a good future, which is why she works so hard. In the future, she hopes to open a grocery store next to her canteen.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory (snack foods, canned goods, and spices) for her store

loans.name: Crispina

texts.en:
Crispina is 70 years old, married, and lives in the Philippines.

To earn a living, Crispina has a tailoring business, where she makes and sells school and office uniforms. She has operated this business for nine years.

She requested a loan in the amount of 5,000 PHP to buy more textiles in making school and office uniforms. Crispina is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Crispina hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional textiles for making school and office uniforms

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: Luis Miguel es un joven responsable y trabajador quien siempre se ha destacado por ser muy emprendedor y por tener grandes ganas de salir adelante.  El se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, granos principales en la dieta básica del país, por lo que posee un mercado muy amplio. Él vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos en casa propia y es ella quien le ayuda a comercializar los productos que producen. Por ser la única fuente de ingresos con la que  cuentan, Luis solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en su cosecha, comprando mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar y así mismo abono. Con esto él espera mejorar sus ventas para contar con una presente y un futuro mejor tanto para él como para su familia.
texts.en: Luis Miguel is a responsable and hard-working youth who has always stood out as very entreprenuerial and for having a great desire to get ahead. He is a corn and bean farmer, principal grains in the country's basic diet. Luis Miguel lives with his wife and 2 children in his own house and she helps to sell the products he produces. Since this is their only source of income, Luis is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL, to have the money necessary to invest in his harvest, purchasing a major quantity of seeds to sow and also, fertilizer. With this he hopes to increase his sales in order to improve the present and future for himself and his family.

loans.use: buy corn seeds and fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional inventory of canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Khoul

texts.en:
Khoul is a resident of Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She is 41 years old, married, and has three children. Two of her children are still attending school.

To earn a living, Khoul has been operating a farming business. Specifically, she grows rice, beans, potatoes, and vegetables for sale. She can earn approximately 17,700 KHR per day through her business. Khoul is thankful that she has a supportive husband who assists her in managing their business.

To improve her farming business and to obtain a fruitful harvest, Khoul would like to borrow some funds to rent laborers (to transplant rice) and to purchase bean seeds (for planting). Khoul hopes that the loan proceeds will enable her to increase her productivity and to yield more crops than in the previous years.

loans.use: to rent laborers for transplanting rice and to purchase bean seeds for planting.

loans.name: Gerocil

texts.en:
This is Gerocil, who is 26 years old and a resident of Caloocan City, Philippines. She is married to Efren, a businessman, and she is a mother to her child. She manages their household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Gerocil operates a poultry supply store, where she sells different supplies, mostly for cocks. She sells it by kilo, and her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 25,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy more feeds and other supplies needed to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Gerocil hopes to grow her business and dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of their work.  It is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stocks of supplies and products needed in her business

loans.name: Ndiang Bambodj Mousdalipha Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Ndiang Mbambodj Mousdalipha existe depuis le 27 décembre 2010;le groupe PC 02 est composé de 22 femmes qui sont issues du même quartier, elles sont parentes et leur activité principale est le commerce. 

Bousso la responsable est âgée de 50 ans, elle est mariée mère de six enfants trois filles et trois garçons; elle mène un commerce d'habits et de produits cosmétiques, elle a une cantine au marché central de Louga.Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en boubou noir-marron et a levé la main gauche.

Elle s'approvisionne à Dakar et à Touba et compte avec son prêt acheter 5 douzaines d'habits enfants, 3 douzaines  de parfum 10 douzaine de chaussures pour se faire beaucoup de revenus.

Avec ses bénéfices tirés de son activité, elle épargne chaque mois et réinjecte une part dans son commerce pour le développer davantage.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois Ndiang Bambodj Mousdalipha was created on December 27, 2010. The group PC 02 consists of 22 women from the same neighborhood. They are all related, and they work mainly in trade. 

Bousso, age 50, is the leader of the group. She is standing at the far right with her left hand raised, wearing a black dress. Bousso is a married mother of six children, three girls and three boys. She sells clothing and beauty products at the central market of Louga where she has a stall. 

Bousso buys her merchandise in Dakar and in Touba, She plans to use her loan to buy five dozen outfits for children, 3 dozen perfumes and 10 dozen pairs of shoes. Her goal is to bolster her income. 

She adds a portion of her profits to her savings every month, and another portion is reinvested in her activity to ensure its continuous expansion.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetic products for resale.

loans.name: Nodira

texts.en:
Nodira is 43 years old. She is a hard-working woman with a great desire to get ahead. Ilhom is her partner. They have a daughter named Farangis, who is 21 years old.

Nodira sells children's clothes. She sells her goods in the local market. She has a lot of customers. She makes periodic trips to accomplish her goal. She began working this way over 21 years ago because she needed to earn money. Currently, her partner helps her to purchase her goods. Because of the good results she is having, she wishes to increase her business by selling new kinds of clothing in addition her usual goods. 

This is her sixth loan with Imon International organization.  She is grateful for its financial support in helping her to realize her plans. She is one of Imon International's good clients, and she has a good credit story. 

She is asking for a loan of TJS 13,000 to buy goods for developing business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy new lines of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
A very responsible mother and wife, Pacita, 47 years old, does everything to help her family and take care of the daily needs of her children. From the village of San Antonio, she is engaged in selling a variety of vegetables such as tomatoes, cabbage and fruits.

Pacita is requesting a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy cabbages, eggplants, tomatoes and bananas for her business. She hopes that someday she can complete her house for the convenience of her family.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, eggplants, tomatoes and bananas for her food business.

loans.name: Munisakhon

texts.en:
Munisakhon is a 30-year-old woman living with her parents. She is not married and has no children.

She always wanted to have a good standard of living, so Munisakhon decided to start a new sewing business. Specifically, she sews women's national dresses in order to generate income with which she can contribute to her family's finances. She received some training at a women's business course, and she believes that she will be very successful because she is hardworking and smart.

She is asking for a loan in the amount of 500 TJS to buy a sewing machine. She hopes that the loan proceeds will allow her to generate more income so that her family can have a better quality of life and better financial opportunities. She thanks you for your support

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is a 34-year-old, married woman with two children. Cecilia lives in Banigan, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

To earn a living, Cecilia owns and operates a general store. She explains that she has operated this business for one year, and that she earns approximately 2,500 PHP per month doing this type of work.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 13,000 PHP to purchase more goods for her general store. Cecilia has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Cecilia hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory for her general store

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is a 40-year-old, married woman with seven children. Marilou lives in Lopoc, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.

To earn a living, Marilou sells dresses. She explains that she has operated this business for two years, and that she earns approximately 800 PHP per month doing this type of work.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 7,000 PHP to purchase different kinds of dresses to re-sell to her customers. Marilou has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Marilou hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional dresses for her clothing business

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria, from the village of Guayabal, is 46 years old, married, and the mother of three children, one of whom is married married. Through her sacrifices, Gloria was able to educate all her children and they are now all working.

Gloria works hard through her retailing business, which she has had for four years. To improve it, she is requesting a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy canned goods, egg, noodles, soft-drinks, and assorted bread to sell. Gloria says that the loan will be very helpful in contributing to the success of her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, egg, noodles, soft-drinks, and assorted bread to sell.

loans.name: Anastacio Francisco

texts.es: Francisco Gómez de 51 años de edad, habita en su vivienda junto a sus 3 hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz y sorgo. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante 20 años de su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás. Debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar este nuevo crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que él consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco Gomez is 51 years old and lives in his home with his three children. He makes a living in agriculture, planting corn and sorghum. He has been working in this field for 20 years of his life and this is how he makes a living each day. He is a hard working man who is responsible and very well known in the area for his big heart and friendliness with others. 

Because it is now planting season he made the decision to begin to prepare himself. It is for this reason that he has chosen to request this new loan with Integral. He will invest in the purchase of seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc. What he hopes for the most is that he may have an abundant harvest that is better than previous ones. This is the way in which he will continue to provide for his family. He trusts in God that with help, dedication and persistence in his work he will achieve his dream to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Mao

texts.en:
Mao is married and operates a farm as the primary source of her income. She has been in this field for many years. 

She became a widow a few years ago, and she is responsible for four children at her age of 56 years. All her children now are dedicated to the garment industry to uplift their living conditions as well as to help their mother. Recently, her oldest child is already settled for marriage.

Mao wants to have a suitable house and provide a comfortable living status to all her children.   Because of the decayed wallboard, the family was afflicted by rain within this rainy season. In this regard, Mao has applied for a loan through HKL, a longstanding Kiva partner, to buy wallboard and pay construction workers. 

In years to come, Mao plans to purchase extra land to expand her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase wallboard and pay construction workers.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is 47 years old,and she has been in active farming for 15 consecutive years.  She currently runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. Her produce includes mainly bananas, milk, and coffee for the local market. 

She is married with five children, with the last two of school-going age.

Hellen has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to build a zero-grazing unit and buy animal feed. She wants to buy enough animal feed while it is still cheap, reflecting the prevailing weather conditions.   She hopes this will in turn save her a lot of money and help her improve her family's  living standards.

Hellen says that the poor road network and pests that attack farm harvests (especially cereals) are her main challenges.

loans.use: To construct a zero-grazing unit and buy animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To construct a greenhouse to grow tomatoes.

loans.name: Kosar's Group

texts.en:
Kosar has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her grocery selling business.

She operates her shop adjacent to her home.  She sells cooking oils, spices, and other grocery items to her community clients.  Her prices and product quality are very good, and she makes good sales every month.

With the loan investment, she will buy grocery items in bulk, which will help her fulfill her clients' needs and increase her profits.

Kosar is the mother of two sons and a daughter. Her elder son is married, while the remaining two are young.  Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transport services to his passengers.

She is a very positive-minded lady.  She is confident she will be able to improve the lifestyle of her family by expanding her business.

loans.use: To buy groceries in bulk for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients in making snacks

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a resident of Nkubu in central Kenya, where she has practiced mixed farming for three years. Milk and vegetables are her main produce. She runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. Besides farming, Grace runs a cereals retail business.

Grace has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her boost her farming. She will use the money to buy cereals seeds and do intensive farming of the cereals she retails, like maize and sorghum. 

She believes her own production will help her earn better income from her cereals retailing, as opposed to sourcing from other farmers and middlemen.

Grace says poor infrastructure and both crop and animal diseases remain the major challenges in farming as well as in her cereals retail business. She appreciates the support Juhudi Kilimo is giving to farmers.

loans.use: To buy cereals seeds for intensive farming.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos Alberto de 37 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos menores de edad, su familia es muy unida y trabajadora ya que tanto Carlos como su esposa velan por el bien de su familia. El posee una granja donde se dedica a criar pollos, dicha granja esta es su casa de habitación. Con el propósito de poder obtener la mayor cantidad de ganancias, Carlos junto a su esposa son los único en realizar este duro trabajo, realizando todas las actividades como alimentarlos, vitaminarlos, comercializarlos y más. Carlos posee muchos clientes fijos por lo que los vende con mucha facilidad, razón principal por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y así poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más pollos, concentrado para alimentarlos y pollerías para colocarlos, con lo que él espera obtener nuevos clientes y de esta forma aumentar en gran manera sus ventas.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto, 37, lives with his wife and two minor children.  His family is very close and hardworking as both Carlos and his wife look after the welfare of their family. He owns a farm dedicated to raising chickens, the farm is also his home. In order to obtain the greatest revenue, Carlos and his wife are the only ones doing the hard work, performing all the activities such as feeding, giving vitamins, selling and more. 

Carlos has many loyal customers to whom he easily sells. His main reason for requesting a loan to INTEGRAL, is so that he can have the money to invest in buying more chickens.  He will concentrate in feeding them and coops to place them.  Carlos hopes to gain new customers and thus greatly increase his sales.

loans.use: to purchase food and vitamins to raise chickens.

loans.name: Mohruhsor

texts.en:
Mohruhsor is 20 years old. She is a hard-working young girl with a great desire to become a successful business woman. She is not married yet and lives with parents. Her parents love her very much. 

Her mother works at the archive of their region, which pays a small salary.  Her salary is not enough for improving the family's condition, so she advised Mohruhsor to begin a new business deal. 

With this aim, Mohruhsor studied the course "To get a success" and got enough skills about business. She is going to be busy with selling cosmetics. 

She will acquire her products in shopping centers in the region. She is asking for a loan of 1,500 TJS to buy cosmetics goods, and she is grateful for its financial support in helping her to realize her plans.  

She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is from the village of Cabisera 27. She is 53 years old and married, with eight school-age children. 

Carmelita raises pigs to fatten and sell. She has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns about 4,000 PHP a month. 

Carmelita is requesting a new loan of 9,000 PHP to purchase piglets to raise and sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise and sell.

loans.name: Joeris

texts.en: Joeris is married with 2 children. She is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. Joeris is a farmer, and she operates a banana production business. She also raises vegetables, particularly chili peppers, to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years, and every month she earns 3,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers, such as manure. Joeris joined GDMPC in 2010. In the future, Joeris hopes to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, such as manure
